source.c98e7558:
matchid = []
name = []
for i in train_data['Id']:
    matchid.append(i.split('_')[0])
    name.append(i.split('_')[1])
    
    
train_data['matchid'] = matchid
train_data['name'] = name
source.6ea19b7d:
X = train_data.drop(['Id','Total Points'], axis = 1)
y = train_data['Total Points']
source.1e846a22:
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.metrics import r2_score
from sklearn.linear_model import LinearRegression
from xgboost import XGBRegressor
source.19f50f81: X_train, X_test, y_train, y_test = train_test_split(X, y, test_size = 0.3, random_state = 1)
source.54776f86:
print("Shape of X_train: ", X_train.shape)
print("Shape of X_train: ", X_test.shape)
source.fe4665d1:
# create a model
linear_model = LinearRegression()

# fit model
linear_model.fit(X_train, y_train)

# predict values
y_hat = linear_model.predict(X_test)

# calculating the accuracy of model
score = r2_score(y_hat, y_test)
print("Accuracy of Linear Regression model is ", score)
